name: Eton Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: Eton Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a specialty pharmaceutical company focused on developing and commercializing innovative products for the pediatric population. Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Deer Park, Illinois, Eton is dedicated to addressing the unique needs of children who often require different dosages and formulations than adults. The company develops a portfolio of proprietary product candidates, including the first FDA-approved liquid formulation of the anticonvulsant drug, which aims to improve accessibility and adherence to treatment in children with epilepsy. Eton's commitment to the pediatric population extends to various therapeutic areas, including pain management, oncology, and infectious diseases. By leveraging a robust pipeline and strategic partnerships, Eton seeks to enhance the quality of life for children and their families through innovative pharmaceutical solutions. The company is also focused on advancing its proprietary formulation technologies, which can be applied to create better versions of existing medications. With a mission to transform pediatric care, Eton Pharmaceuticals continues to strive for breakthroughs that address unmet medical needs in the healthcare industry.
